title: Silver 4 Adc main Looking for the people to either duo with or flexB
body: _Hey guys looking for people to duo with or flex with im silver 4 stats are bad but i can prove with one or two games with me you would want to play with me i main draven have since season 3 also play lucian, and jinx. I mid as well pretty damn good i only play ahri in that lane so yeah. Please get back to me because ive had silver players add me and say im bad just by looking at stats so dont waste my time in adding me look me up first IGN: Spudddyyy___

replies.body: Id be game, need a support main to cover yo butt?
